abstract: Top China steelmaker Baosteel is weighing a bid to counter BHP Billiton‘s $125 billion takeover offer for Rio Tinto Group, Baosteel Chairman Xu Lejiang told a Chinese business newspaper.
lead_paragraph: Top China steelmaker Baosteel is weighing a bid to counter BHP Billiton‘s $125 billion takeover offer for Rio Tinto Group, Baosteel Chairman Xu Lejiang told a Chinese business newspaper.

headline.main: Baosteel Chief Said to Mull Rio Counter-Bid
